legend: Fifth conference participants, 1927. Institut International de Physique Solvay in Leopold Park..
title: Solvay Conference on Physics, from 24 to 29 October 1927

guest.name: Albert Einstein
guest.bio: German-born theoretical physicist. Einstein developed the theory of relativity, one of the two pillars of modern physics. Einstein's work is also known for its influence on the philosophy of science.
